name: The King's Relic
description:
####################################
IMPORTANT NOTE

We found a few bugs that will not let you beat the game that made it into the final build that we submitted for the Game Jam. We are super proud of this project and wish for people to play the fixed version, if you played the game and enjoyed it, we hope you consider giving the fixed build a try!

The King's Relic v1.1

#################################### ====== Gameplay ====== 

The relic will have 4 gems each corresponding to an enemy color. Press the corresponding key on the gem to defeat the enemy of the corresponding color.

The relic will only target the nearest opponent, with a small indicator on top of their sprite. Be careful! If you press the wrong key or choose a wrong colored gem, the relic will penalize you and disable one of the gems.

The relic is an unstable device, its gems are known to behave erratically. Be alert for any changes!

====== Controls ======

Keyboard keys listed on the gem - Defeat nearest enemy 
Mouse - Menu navigation

====== Story ======

You don't even remember how you got your hands on this relic, with it's 4 engraved gems and mysterious symbols.

You've always been a curious explorer, answering the call of adventure, but the gravitating force you feel emanating from the cave, seemingly magnified by the cold relic around your neck, is what drives you now.

---

Known bugs:

- Difficulty sometimes does not scale properly in some rooms. The relic does not shift its symbols and colors when it should.
- After defeating the first wave of enemies at your last encounter, the game will stop working instead of proceeding to the next wave.
